title: Mosaic Leg from a Mummiform Figure
description:
Glass inlay in form of thigh, leg, and foot of a mummiform figure in fused mosaic glass with net pattern in blue and white on red ground. Traces of gilding on side. Front side in raised relief; back flat.
Condition: Minor blemished around edges, hardly visible.
section: The Late Period through the Beginning of the Roman Occupation

museum_location.name: 19th Dynasty to Roman Period, Martha A. and Robert S. Rubin Gallery, 3rd Floor
